channel.title: Cache or Models?
channel.description:
I feel really stupid asking this but I am curious.
Let's say that I created my own world but would like to either include or edit some of RuneScape's buildings/castles. Would I just add and form walls into the shape of the building or is there a specific way to edit Runescape's Building models.

item.title: Cache or Models?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Actually, runescape’s buildings are completely built object by object. Its not like WoW where all buildings are a model. The only way to form a building is to find flatland (or make it with a map editor) and start adding the walls, windowed walls, etc. If you do that on land that isnt flat you’ll quickly learn why I recommended flatland.

Read full topic
